name: premier_league_standings
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool premier_league_standings.
Tool description: English Premier League Standings & Table
API description: Fetches the Premier League standings data for a given season using the RapidAPI Premier League Standings API.

season.description: The season for which the standings are to be retrieved, specified as a string (e.g., '2022'). If not provided, the current season's standings will be fetched.
